trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Clinton
There were no other sightings in Clinton on or around August 7th 2005
Summary: Distant lights instantly appeared directly overhead and remained as solid appearing enormous object (ship)
divs: sighting detailsi have previously emailed this account to dr. eric kubik and will meet with him and anyone else to deliver a 25 photo series of ufo taken the same week, same location. in august 2005 i was in my backyard walking toward the salt marsh at dusk. i looked out over the ocean (l.i. sound) and saw lights in the distance that appeared to be a ufo. strange as it sounds, the shape defined by those white lights was not what i would have imagined a flying saucer to look like. it appeared like the tall vehicle that was depicted in the "et" movie which i thought was ridiculous at the time that the movie was made. i turned and continued to approach the marsh and heard a brief low pitched hum behind me. as i entered the marsh of tall reeds, i was shocked to find that the craft had instantly appeared directly overhead no more than 100 feet in the air (i used to be medical crew on a medical helicopter) and was absolutely huge. i was terrified thinking that it had spotted me and i crouched and hid in the wet reeds. it now looked to be a solid craft, almost like a vast floating city, similar in scope to views from under the starship enterprise. there was a window with vague figures inside and some sort of searchlight which scanned the marsh. eventually i sensed that it was not looking for me but rather for beings awaiting pickup. i did see shadowy images of figures around me in the marsh and i sensed a feeling of calm as they pointed out the overhead ship in a kind of proud or reverent manner. there was no verbal or telepathic communication. i witnessed them being picked up methodically as if ascending an invisible staircase. another interesting point: i had a flashlight in my pocket and i felt a definite magnetic tug on it, but not strong enough to pull it away from me. what is weird is that the distant lights had approached me incredibly rapidly, yet once overhead, this huge craft moved imperceptibly slowly and rook a full hour to pass over and fade away. i will never forget this and would be willing to undergo hypnosis to provide more physical detail of the structure. i have taken video of lights across the marsh (about 1\4 mile away) which seem to be security lights on buildings along route 1. they behave strangely as they will suddenly zoom right up to the camera and then recede repeatedly. when up close, they do odd things and the perimeter resembles the sun's corona and even look like holes or openings like portals at times. they also prohect a narrow blue beam down into the marsh. i have learned that my grandmother witnessed an apparent crash into this marsh in approx october 1980, but did not report it. are you aware of any sighjtings in clinton(westbrook line) at that time? some residents have a vague memory of something. i have a 25 photo series taken the same week...intricate light structures in the sky in formation; they change spatial relationship to each other, sometimes cast relections onto clouds and accompanied by a white ball of light. i have others also and would be very interested to have them seen by your organization and\or subjected to analysis. i am sane, honest and worked 32 years in patient care in hospitals. i've always had an open mind to the idea of extraterrestrial life, but never witnessed anything until this. i am age 55. i believe that i've stumbled onto something and that it is very important. thank you.
